Brand.name: Solving Crew
Brand.promise: From problem to production — with the right people.
Brand.description: Senior-led product engineering. Start with the roles you need and scale as projects grow.

Footer.brandDesc: Elite IT staff augmentation for companies that refuse to compromise on engineering quality.

Home.subheadline: PropTech & FinTech experience • EU-based delivery • Start small and scale as your pipeline grows.

h1.title: We solve constraints, not org charts
h1.text: We propose the smallest team shape that unblocks progress — and scale only when it pays off.

h2.title: Build + run, reliably
h2.text: IaC, observability, CI/CD and testing are part of delivery — not an afterthought.

h3.title: PropTech, FinTech, B2B SaaS
h3.text: Integrations, data-heavy systems and regulated environments where reliability matters.

heroBullets.title: Small team, senior-led
heroBullets.text: We join as a compact crew that unblocks delivery fast.

heroBullets.title: Production-first delivery
heroBullets.text: CI/CD, observability and quality are part of delivery — not an afterthought.

heroBullets.title: Domain depth
heroBullets.text: PropTech & FinTech experience for integration-heavy, data-rich systems.

Home.stackNote: High-performance, event-driven architecture across the full stack.

ctaBlock.title: Tell us what’s blocking you
ctaBlock.text: One role, a small pod, or a delivery lane — we’ll propose a shape that fits.

Services.title: Services
Services.lead: From strategic leadership to hands-on implementation, we provide the technical expertise you need.

leadership.title: IT Leadership
leadership.subtitle: Strategic Direction
leadership.description: Fractional CTOs and Technical Directors who align technology strategy with business objectives. Architecture reviews, tech debt assessment, and roadmap planning.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.subtitle: Scalable Systems
backend.description: Robust, scalable APIs and microservices. High-performance systems handling millions of transactions. Event-driven architectures and distributed systems.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.subtitle: Exceptional Interfaces
frontend.description: Pixel-perfect interfaces with exceptional UX. Component libraries, design systems, and performant SPAs that users love and competitors envy.

qa.title: QA Engineering
qa.subtitle: Quality Assurance
qa.description: Comprehensive test strategies that catch bugs before users do. Manual and automated testing, performance testing, and security audits.

devops.title: DevOps Engineering
devops.subtitle: Infrastructure Excellence
devops.description: CI/CD pipelines that ship with confidence. Infrastructure as code, container orchestration, and observability that keeps systems humming.

product.title: Product Management
product.subtitle: Vision to Execution
product.description: Product leaders who bridge the gap between vision and execution. Roadmap development, stakeholder alignment, and data-driven prioritization.

design.title: Product Design
design.subtitle: UI/UX Excellence
design.description: User-centric design that solves real problems. Wireframing, prototyping, and high-fidelity UI design that developers love to build.

Expertise.title: Expertise
Expertise.lead: We work in complex domains where reliability, speed and clarity matter.

proptech.title: PropTech
proptech.text: Listings, valuation, integrations, back-office workflows, reporting and customer portals.

fintech.title: FinTech
fintech.text: Payments, identity, compliance-sensitive flows and audit-friendly delivery.

highload.title: High-load & platforms
highload.text: Event-driven architecture, performance, scalability, observability and operations.

Technology.title: Technology
Technology.lead: Modern stack, production-first engineering, and pragmatic choices based on constraints.

backend.title: Backend
backend.text: Java (Quarkus/Spring), Node.js, Go • microservices • REST/GraphQL • event-driven messaging.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.text: React, Next.js, TypeScript • design systems • accessible UI • performance.

mobile.title: Mobile
mobile.text: Pragmatic mobile delivery where needed (hybrid or native depending on constraints).

data.title: Data & search
data.text: Postgres, ElasticSearch • data pipelines • analytics-friendly models.

quality.title: Quality engineering
quality.text: Automation-first mindset • Playwright/Cypress • contract testing where it pays off.

design.title: Design
design.text: Figma-driven delivery • UX prototypes • design systems and component libraries.

Team.title: Team
Team.comingSoon: Profiles & leadership details will be published in February 2026.

Industries.label: Industry Expertise
Industries.title: Deep domain knowledge
Industries.subtitle: in high-stakes industries
Industries.description: We don't just write code—we understand the regulatory landscape, user expectations, and business models that drive success.

fintech.name: FinTech
fintech.description: Payment processing, trading platforms, and banking infrastructure. PCI-DSS compliant systems handling billions in transactions.

proptech.name: PropTech
proptech.description: Property management platforms and real estate marketplaces that transform how we interact with spaces.

TechStack.label: Technology
TechStack.title: Market-tested stack
TechStack.description: We work with the technologies that power the world's most demanding applications. No experiments on your dime—proven tools, proven results.
TechStack.statement: Our engineers stay current with evolving technologies while maintaining deep expertise in battle-tested solutions. We choose the right tool for each job.

fintech.title: Payment Processing Platform
fintech.description: We architected and built a robust real-time payment gateway designed for high reliability and rapid transaction processing. The system ensures seamless financial operations with a focus on security and zero downtime.

proptech.title: Property Management Suite
proptech.description: A comprehensive end-to-end platform that streamlines property operations. From tenant onboarding to maintenance requests, our solution modernizes the entire real estate management lifecycle.

enterprise.title: Cloud Migration
enterprise.description: Successfully transformed a legacy monolithic system into a modern, scalable microservices architecture. This modernization significantly improved deployment velocity and operational efficiency.

testimonials.text: Nexus engineers integrated seamlessly with our team and delivered beyond expectations. They're not vendors—they're partners.
testimonials.author: Sarah Chen

Contact.label: Contact
Contact.title: Let's build something great
Contact.description: Whether you need a single specialist or a full team, we'll craft an engagement that fits your needs and budget.

form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholder: What are you building? What skills do you need?
form.sentDesc: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

About.label: About Us
About.title: Engineering partners, not vendors
About.description1: We founded Nexus because we saw how broken IT outsourcing was. Misaligned incentives, communication gaps, talent lottery. We built something better.
About.description2: Our engineers work from European time zones with significant overlap with both EU and US business hours. We speak your language—literally and technically—and treat your codebase like our own.

excellence.title: Engineering Excellence
excellence.desc: We hire elite engineers and continuously invest in their growth to ensure top-tier delivery.

transparent.title: Transparent Partnership
transparent.desc: No black boxes. Full visibility into progress, challenges, and decisions.

impact.title: Business Impact Focus
impact.desc: Code is a means, not an end. We measure success by business outcomes.

longterm.title: Long-term Thinking
longterm.desc: We build systems meant to last and evolve. No quick wins that create tech debt.

Process.label: Process
Process.title: How we work
Process.description: A proven methodology refined across hundreds of engagements. Fast time-to-value without cutting corners.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We dive deep into your requirements, technical landscape, and team dynamics. Understanding context is everything.

matching.title: Matching
matching.description: Precision talent selection based on technical skills, domain experience, and cultural fit. No resume roulette.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Seamless onboarding into your workflows, tools, and ceremonies. Our engineers become your engineers.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: Continuous value delivery with transparent communication. Regular check-ins ensure alignment and momentum.

models.title: Engagement Models
models.subtitle: Flexible arrangements to fit your needs

augmentation.title: Staff Augmentation
augmentation.desc: Individual engineers embedded in your team, working your hours, using your tools.

team.title: Dedicated Team
team.desc: A full squad with complementary skills, managed as a cohesive unit.

project.title: Project-Based
project.desc: End-to-end delivery of defined scope with fixed timeline and budget.

start.question: How quickly can you start?
start.answer: We typically start within 48 hours of our initial consultation. Our process is streamlined to get us integrated with your team as fast as possible.

timezone.question: Do you work in my time zone?
timezone.answer: Yes, we are based in the EU but work across US and European time zones. We ensure at least 4 hours of overlap with your core working hours.

pricing.question: What is your pricing model?
pricing.answer: We offer both staff augmentation (hourly/monthly rates) and project-based fixed pricing, depending on your needs. Contact us for a detailed quote.

pm.question: Do you provide Project Managers?
pm.answer: Yes, if needed. However, our senior engineers are self-organizing and capable of working directly with your product owners.
